title: Stock Futures Muted Ahead of Target, Lowe’s Earnings
sub_head: Bitcoin prices fall, adding to a recent decline as the cryptocurrency comes off record highs
body:
U.S. stock futures were muted ahead of earnings from retailers Lowe’s, Target and TJX ahead of the opening bell.
Futures for the S&P 500 edged up 0.1% Wednesday. The broad market index rose Tuesday, leaving it just short of last week’s closing high, after a consumer-spending report raised hopes for the holiday-sales season. Contracts for the tech-focused Nasdaq-100 and futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were each up 0.1% Wednesday.
